column22: Key Skill Gaps (e.g., PyTorch, ROS2, LQR, DPO)
column24: Questions to Ask (data access, supervision, eval metrics)

column1: Observability for network services — time-series anomaly detection (INRETE)
column32: Data quality/missingness; limited/no labels; alert fatigue; NDA/data access timing.
column33: Is telemetry accessible from week 1? Any NDA preventing thesis use? Who is the weekly mentor and cadence? What are success metrics (FAR/day, TTD)? What stack is used on-site (Prometheus/Elastic/Grafana)?
column34: Networking telemetry KPIs; seasonality-aware detection & HIL explainability
column35: Build STL+MAD+PELT baseline on a sample trace; add motif/discord discovery; Streamlit triage view with ‘Explain’ panel; draft KPI→cause playbook.

column1: Low-resource speech transcription for hearing-impaired intercoms (corporate)
column32: 512MB RAM/NPU constraints may hurt WER; NPU delegate availability; domain data scarcity/licensing; success metric (target WER) not fixed.
column33: What is the exact target device and NPU SDK? Is ≤512MB a hard cap? What target WER/CER under street noise will count as success? Is an Italian dataset provided? Can on-device inference be done without Python? Any plan for deployment test on actual hardware?
column35: Quantize tiny model (int8/int4) with CTranslate2/whisper.cpp; add VAD→chunked decode; measure RTF, peak RAM; run SNR sweep with street-noise augmentation.

column1: Secure Enclave for private ML IP execution (GAP8/DORY)
column32: Access to GAP8 board/toolchain; secure-boot/attestation complexity; integration into DORY; side-channel/residual risk management.
column33: Is GAP8 hardware and SDK access guaranteed from week 1? What is the expected secure boot/attestation scope? Are crypto libraries approved (mbedTLS/TinyCrypt)? What are measurable success criteria (latency overhead, attestation flow)?
column34: Applied crypto (AES-GCM + signatures); GAP8/PULP toolchain & DORY internals
column35: Implement model package (header+sig) packer (Python) & verifier (C); flash sample on GAP8; measure verify time & peak RAM; draft threat model.
